lead_paragraph: Speculation about Coach Vinny Del Negro’s future with the Bulls (13-17) has been rampant since the team blew a 35-point lead to Sacramento at home last week.
snippet: Speculation about Coach Vinny Del Negro’s future with the Bulls (13-17) has been rampant since the team blew a 35-point lead to Sacramento at home last week.

headline.main: The Pulse: The Coaching Market for a Bulls Vacancy
headline.print_headline: The Pulse: The Coaching Market for a Bulls Vacancy
